section_title:
24g02  General considerations - Sec 13(a)(9) of the Act, prior to 1966
Amendments.
text:
(a)   Sec 13(a)(9) of the Act, prior to 2/1/67,
provided that the MW and OT requirements of the FLSA would not apply to “any
employee of a street, suburban or interurban electric railway, or local trolley
or motor bus carrier, not in an enterprise described in Section 3(s)(2)”. (b)   It should be noted that the MW and OT
exemption provided by Sec 13(a)(9) as amended in 1961, was available only for
employment which was not in an enterprise described in old Sec 3(s)(2). 1/
html:
(a)   Sec 13(a)(9) of the Act, prior to 2/1/67, provided that the MW and OT requirements of the FLSA would not apply to “any employee of a street, suburban or interurban electric railway, or local trolley or motor bus carrier, not in an enterprise described in Section 3(s)(2)”.

 

(b)   It should be noted that the MW and OT exemption provided by Sec 13(a)(9) as amended in 1961, was available only for employment which was not in an enterprise described in old Sec 3(s)(2). 1/
